text:
Hon. PM #SheikhHasina received the first dose of the #Astrazeneca #Covid19 #vaccine today at Ganabhaban, her official residence in #Dhaka. Her sister and #Bangabandhu’s youngest daughter Sheikh Rehana, was present with her during this time. 
#Vaccinated #JoyBangla #ThankYouPM https://t.co/wXtaz20wng
